1001.name: Minor Ward
1001.cast_message_self: You whisper a prayer of vigilance. Your senses sharpen.
1001.cast_message_room: {caster}'s eyes flash with a vigilant light.

1002.name: Shield of Faith
1002.cast_message_self: A shimmering, translucent shield manifests around you.

1003.name: Shield
1003.cast_message_self: An invisible disk of force hovers before you to deflect attacks.
1003.cast_message_room: An invisible disk of force hovers before {caster}.

1004.name: Deflection
1004.cast_message_self: The air around you hardens, deflecting incoming blows.
1004.cast_message_room: The air around {caster} seems to harden and shimmer.

1005.name: Resist Fear
1005.cast_message_room: {caster} stands taller, their expression grim and determined.

1006.name: Banish Vermin
1006.cast_message_target: You point at {target} and command it to BEGONE!
1006.cast_message_room: {caster} points a finger at {target}, shouting a word of banishment!

1007.name: Mage Armor
1007.cast_message_self: A field of force surrounds you, like invisible armor.

1008.name: Lesser Dispel
1008.cast_message_self: You feel a cleansing wave wash over you.
1008.cast_message_room: {caster} shudders as a cleansing wave washes over them.

1009.name: Protection from Evil
1009.cast_message_self: You glow with a soft, holy light that repels evil.
1009.cast_message_room: {caster} glows with a soft, holy light.

1010.name: Barkskin
1010.cast_message_self: Your skin toughens, taking on the texture of rough oak.

1011.name: Arcane Aegis
1011.cast_message_self: Plates of force interlock over your armor.
1011.cast_message_room: Plates of translucent force appear over {caster}'s armor.

1012.name: Remove Blindness
1012.cast_message_target: You wash the darkness from {target}'s eyes.
1012.cast_message_room: {caster} touches {target}'s eyes, washing away the darkness.

1013.name: Sanctuary
1013.cast_message_self: A profound aura of peace surrounds you.
1013.cast_message_room: A profound aura of peace surrounds {caster}.

1014.name: Lightning Reflexes
1014.cast_message_self: You feel lighter, ready to dodge at a moment's notice.

1015.name: Resist Elements
1015.cast_message_self: You feel insulated against heat and cold.
1015.cast_message_room: {caster} is surrounded by a faint, thermal haze.

1017.name: Watchful Eye
1017.cast_message_self: You feel a third eye open in your mind, watching for danger.

1018.name: Free Action
1018.cast_message_self: You feel slippery and unconstrained by magic or web.
1018.cast_message_room: {caster} seems to move with supernatural fluidity.

1019.name: Arcane Lock
1019.cast_message_self: You lock your armor's joints with magical force.
1019.cast_message_room: {caster}'s armor glows as it locks into place.

1021.name: Mass Shield
1021.cast_message_self: You weave a shield that covers your entire party.
1021.cast_message_room: A shield of force extends to cover the group.

1022.name: Invisibility Purge
1022.cast_message_self: You emit a pulse that highlights the unseen.
1022.cast_message_room: {caster} emits a pulse that ripples through the air.

1023.name: Circle of Protection
1023.cast_message_self: You project a wide circle of protective energy around your group!
1023.cast_message_room: {caster} projects a wide circle of protective energy!

1024.name: Elemental Blast
1024.cast_message_target: You unleash a raw blast of disruptive energy at {target}!
1024.cast_message_room: {caster} unleashes a blast of disruptive energy at {target}!

1025.name: Mass Ward
1025.cast_message_self: You extend your senses to your allies.
1025.cast_message_room: {caster} extends a protective watch over the group.

1026.name: Binding Strike
1026.cast_message_target: Bands of force constrict around {target} as you strike!

1027.name: Silence
1027.cast_message_self: All sound fades around you. You move in perfect silence.

1028.name: Stone Skin
1028.cast_message_self: Your skin turns grey and hard as granite.
1028.cast_message_room: {caster}'s skin turns grey and hard as granite.

1029.name: Regenerate
1029.cast_message_self: A massive surge of life energy knits your wounds instantly.
1029.cast_message_room: {caster}'s wounds knit together before your eyes.

1030.name: Glyph of Warding
1030.cast_message_target: A glowing glyph appears on {target} and detonates!

1031.name: Divine Wrath
1031.cast_message_target: You channel the pure wrath of the gods at {target}!
1031.cast_message_room: {caster} strikes {target} with a pillar of divine light!

1032.name: Repulsion
1032.cast_message_self: You create a field that pushes everything away.
1032.cast_message_room: A field of force pushes you away from {caster}.

1033.name: Dimensional Anchor
1033.cast_message_target: A green ray strikes {target}, weighing them down.

1034.name: Dismissal
1034.cast_message_target: You command the forces binding {target} to this plane to unravel!
1034.cast_message_room: {caster} commands the forces binding {target} to unravel!

1035.name: Remove Curse
1035.cast_message_target: You unweave the dark magic cursing {target}.

1036.name: Spell Shield
1036.cast_message_self: Runes of negation orbit your body, ready to absorb magic.

1037.name: True Seeing
1037.cast_message_self: You see all things as they truly are.
1037.cast_message_room: {caster}'s eyes glow with piercing blue light.

1038.name: Death Ward
1038.cast_message_self: A somber grey aura protects your life force.

1039.name: Undeath to Death
1039.cast_message_target: You command the stolen life force within {target} to disperse!
1039.cast_message_room: {caster} commands the life force within {target} to disperse!

1040.name: Shield of Law
1040.cast_message_self: Geometric planes of force reinforce your defenses.

1041.name: Cloak of Chaos
1041.cast_message_self: Your form blurs and shifts chaotically.

1042.name: Mind Blank
1042.cast_message_self: Your mind becomes a void, undetectable and untouchable.
1042.cast_message_room: {caster}'s presence seems to fade from your mind's eye.

1043.name: Banishment
1043.cast_message_target: You rip a hole in reality to cast {target} out!
1043.cast_message_room: {caster} rips a hole in reality to cast {target} out!

1044.name: Greater Dispel
1044.cast_message_target: You rip the magical auras from {target}!

1045.name: Prismatic Shield
1045.cast_message_self: A multi-colored shield of light swirls around you.
1045.cast_message_room: A multi-colored shield of light swirls around {caster}.

1046.name: Holy Aura
1046.cast_message_self: A blinding holy light surrounds you and your allies.
1046.cast_message_room: A blinding holy light surrounds the group.

1047.name: Unholy Aura
1047.cast_message_self: A dark, protective miasma surrounds you and your allies.
1047.cast_message_room: A dark miasma surrounds the group.

1048.name: Foresight
1048.cast_message_self: You see attacks before they happen.

1049.name: Wall of Force
1049.cast_message_self: You conjure an invisible, immovable wall of force.
1049.cast_message_room: An invisible wall of force appears around {caster}.

1050.name: Aegis of the Gods
1050.cast_message_self: You are encased in blinding, impenetrable divine light!
1050.cast_message_room: {caster} is encased in blinding, impenetrable divine light!
